com.example.jacob.mybrary

Class GsonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.jacob.mybrary.GsonManager

  • public class GsonManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class for managing Gson actions. It is currently a simple container class but more complex functionality may be needed in the future. Created by Jacob on 2015-11-04.
